text: I heard so much about your trip, it's… you've been doing a dumb bike, it's quite impressive. Putting back a certain amount of organic content is the most vital and basic thing to do. I'm very glad that what I was expecting this meeting I was saying, this is brilliant because, you know, as I said, we have similar priorities. If a EU communicates the soil concerns are big and they are working towards it or it is their agenda, I think it will be hugely encouraging for other nations. I will make sure that message sounds clearly for everyone. Let's save soil, which is our common resource. Let's put together and work on a common message for all to save a resource that determines our future. Save the soil.
